attributes.action: Remove the Lord recorded bragging about being paid £100,000.00 from the Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgraceful that a legislator can brag about being paid £100,000.00 by a company.
This is completely contrary to any notion of democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
